item.title: Burp Proxy
item.description: Burp Proxy allows us to intercept and modify requests/responses between ourselves and the target when interacting with web apps. These can then be manipulated or sent to other tools for further processing before being allowed to continue to their destination.

item.title: Burp Comparer
item.description: Burp ComparerÂ allows us to compare two pieces of data at either word or byte level. Even though it’s not something that is unique to Burp Suite, being able to send pieces of data directly into a comparison tool with a single keyboard shortcut can speed things up considerably.
